snippet: A two-day festival, Eric Dolphy: Freedom of Sound, will take place at Montclair State University in Montclair, N.J., on May 30 and 31.
abstract: A two-day festival, Eric Dolphy: Freedom of Sound, will take place at Montclair State University in Montclair, N.J., on May 30 and 31.

headline.main: Jazz Festival to Honor Eric Dolphy
headline.print_headline: Festival to Honor Jazz’s Eric Dolphy
